verses.verse: Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068> to his anointed <WH4899>, to Cyrus <WH3566>, whose right hand <WH3225> I have held <WH2388>, to subdue <WH7286> nations <WH1471> before <WH6440> him <WH6605>; and I will loose the body <WH4975> of kings <WH4428>, to open <WH6605> before <WH6440> him the two leaved gates <WH1817>; and the gates <WH8179> shall not be shut <WH5462>;

I will go <WH3212> before <WH6440> you <WH3474>, and make the crooked places <WH1921> straight <WH3474>: I will break in pieces <WH7665> the gates <WH1817> of brass <WH5154>, and cut in pieces <WH1438> the bars <WH1280> of iron <WH1270>:

And I will give <WH5414> you the treasures <WH214> of darkness <WH2822>, and hidden riches <WH4301> of secret places <WH4565>, that you may know <WH3045> that I <WH3068>, the Lord, which call <WH7121> you by your name <WH8034>, am the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>.

For Jacob <WH3290> my servant <WH5650>'s sake <WH3478>, and Israel my elect <WH972>, I have even called <WH7121> you by your name <WH8034>: I have surnamed <WH3655> you <WH3045>, though you have not known me.
I am the Lord <WH3068>, and there is none else <WH430>, there is no God beside <WH2108> me <WH247>: I girded you <WH3045>, though you have not known me:
That they may know <WH3045> from the rising <WH4217> of the sun <WH8121>, and from the west <WH4628>, that there is none <WH657> beside <WH1107> me <WH3068>. I am the Lord, and there is none else.
I form <WH3335> the light <WH216>, and create <WH1254> darkness <WH2822>: I make <WH6213> peace <WH7965>, and create <WH1254> evil <WH7451>: I the Lord <WH3068> do all these things <WH6213>.

Drop down <WH7491>, you heavens <WH8064>, from above <WH4605>, and let the skies <WH7834> pour down <WH5140> righteousness <WH6664>: let the earth <WH776> open <WH6605>, and let them bring forth <WH6509> salvation <WH3468>, and let righteousness <WH6666> spring up <WH6779> together <WH3162>; I the Lord <WH3068> have created it <WH1254>.

Woe <WH1945> unto him that strives <WH7378> with his Maker <WH3335>! Let the potsherd <WH2789> argue with the potsherds <WH2789> of the earth <WH127>. Shall the clay <WH2563> say <WH559> to him that fashions <WH3335> it <WH6213>, What make you <WH6467>? or your work, He has no hands <WH3027>?
Woe <WH1945> unto him that says <WH559> unto his father <WH1>, What fathered <WH3205> you <WH802>? or to the woman, What have you brought forth <WH2342>?

Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068>, the Holy One <WH6918> of Israel <WH3478>, and his Maker <WH3335>, Ask <WH7592> me of things to come <WH857> concerning my sons <WH1121>, and concerning the work <WH6467> of my hands <WH3027> command you me <WH6680>.

I have made <WH6213> the earth <WH776>, and created <WH1254> man <WH120> upon it <WH3027>: I, even my hands, have stretched out <WH5186> the heavens <WH8064>, and all their army <WH6635> have I commanded <WH6680>.

I have raised him up <WH5782> in righteousness <WH6664>, and I will direct <WH3474> all his ways <WH1870>: he shall build <WH1129> my city <WH5892>, and he shall let go <WH7971> my captives <WH1546>, not for price <WH4242> nor reward <WH7810>, says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>.

Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068>, The labor <WH3018> of Egypt <WH4714>, and merchandise <WH5505> of Ethiopia <WH3568> and of the Sabeans <WH5436>, men <WH582> of stature <WH4060>, shall come over <WH5674> unto you <WH3212>, and they shall be your: they shall come after <WH310> you <WH2131>; in chains they shall come over <WH5674>, and they shall fall down <WH7812> unto you <WH6419>, they shall make supplication unto you <WH410>, saying, Surely God is in you <WH657>; and there is none else, there is no God <WH430>.
Truly <WH403> you are a God <WH410> that hide <WH5641> yourself <WH430>, O God of Israel <WH3478>, the Savior <WH3467>.
They shall be ashamed <WH954>, and also confounded <WH3637>, all of them <WH1980>: they shall go to confusion <WH3639> together <WH3162> that are makers <WH2796> of idols <WH6736>.

But Israel <WH3478> shall be saved <WH3467> in the Lord <WH3068> with a everlasting <WH5769> salvation <WH8668>: you shall not be ashamed <WH954> nor confounded <WH3637> world <WH5769> without end <WH5703>.

For thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068> that created <WH1254> the heavens <WH8064>; God <WH430> himself that formed <WH3335> the earth <WH776> and made <WH6213> it <WH3559>; he has established it <WH1254>, he created it not void <WH8414>, he formed <WH3335> it to be inhabited <WH3427>: I am the Lord <WH3068>; and there is none else.

I have not spoken <WH1696> in secret <WH5643>, in a dark <WH2822> place <WH4725> of the earth <WH776>: I said <WH559> not unto the seed <WH2233> of Jacob <WH3290>, Seek <WH1245> you me in vain <WH8414>: I the Lord <WH3068> speak <WH1696> righteousness <WH6664>, I declare <WH5046> things that are right <WH4339>.

Assemble <WH6908> yourselves and come <WH935>; draw near <WH5066> together <WH3162>, you that are escaped <WH6412> of the nations <WH1471>: they have no knowledge <WH3045> that set up <WH5375> the wood <WH6086> of their engraved image <WH6459>, and pray <WH6419> unto a god <WH410> that cannot save <WH3467>.

Tell <WH5046> you <WH5066>, and bring them near; Yes <WH3289>, let them take counsel together <WH3162>: who has declared <WH8085> this from ancient time <WH6924>? who has told <WH5046> it from that time <WH3068>? have not I the Lord? and there is no God <WH430> else beside <WH1107> me <WH6662>; a just God <WH410> and a Savior <WH3467>; there is none <WH369> beside me <WH2108>.
Look <WH6437> unto me <WH3467>, and be you saved, all the ends <WH657> of the earth <WH776>: for I am God <WH410>, and there is none else.

I have sworn <WH7650> by myself <WH1697>, the word is gone out <WH3318> of my mouth <WH6310> in righteousness <WH6666>, and shall not return <WH7725>, That unto me every knee <WH1290> shall bow <WH3766>, every tongue <WH3956> shall swear <WH7650>.

Surely <WH559>, shall one say, in the Lord <WH3068> have I righteousness <WH6666> and strength <WH5797>: even to him shall men come <WH935>; and all that are incensed <WH2734> against him shall be ashamed <WH954>.
In the Lord <WH3068> shall all the seed <WH2233> of Israel <WH3478> be justified <WH6663>, and shall glory <WH1984>.
